#summary Definition of t_checkpoint

= t_checkpoint =

The t_checkpoint table contains the base information for a check point.  A checkpoint is directly associated to a row in t_feed_file. 

|| *Key* || *Name* || *Type* || *Null* || *Description* ||
|| PK || checkpoint_id || int || No || Uniquely defines a row (Automatically incremented) ||
|| || phase_id || varchar(60) || No || Uniquely defines the checkpoint phase within the given set ||
|| || current_file_index || int || Specifies the position in feed file of the most recent checkpoint. ||
|| FK || feed_file_id || int || Reference to associated feed file. ||
